item.title: Overgrown weeds. Some covering drains, 26th July
item.description:
The weeds have overgrown. Some are now covering the drains, blocking the drain and creating a big puddle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arthur Grove, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud and debris in road, 26th July
item.description:
After three weeks of major gas repairs in the road the road has been left in a very muddy state with considerable debris and waste in the kerb gutters. Unfortunately over the last few years the regular motorised road sweeping service has not been able to clean the road during the week due to commuter parking. The road would be full of non-residents cars. The road is only clear of commuter cars at the weekend. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burcharbro Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees overhanging the public footpath, 26th July
item.description:
Seems like this problem has never been dealt with. It’s main road which has heavy traffic including buses . The area is busy for pedestrians as there are many local shops . The vegetation pushes the pedestrians towards the curb which is dangerous. Need cutting back - seems like it was reported in March 2025 and totally ignored.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1A, Valliers Wood Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Walworth road full of mess, 26th July
item.description:
Rubish left front of shops, busy Street, People has to walk next to rubish left on Street. It is discusting. Zone2 London and mess on Street like that. Also nobody clean Street for Long time. Whole Walworth Road. Mein Street!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Walworth Road, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
